author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: How did all the Texans enjoy the free trial of Canadian weather?

author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: Right now I'm in the mood to watch a how it's made episode on weighted blankets, while curled up inside a weighted blanket. That is all.

author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: Can this be the year that we end new year's resolutions? I think we all collectively can agree that it's just bull shit meant to make us feel like shit at the end of the year... And if 2021 is anything like 2020, I don't think we'd survive it...

author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: Pro tip for a cancer-libra romantic pairing: if your cancer boyfriend asks you a question prefaced with "this is not an attack" DO NOT ANSWER HONESTLY. It's a trap... He will hold it against you. https://t.co/LtuhwLn34x

author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: I'm just waiting for the right joke to hit the right person so they will offer me an HBO special, and then it's over for you bitches!

author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: omg, I can handle the politics, the plague, and the fires. But, I was watching lifetime a few nights ago and they were advertising Christmas movies starting oct 28th. Thats how I know this is the apocalypse.

author: Vivid_Lunacy
text: I’m bored... and that’s so dangerous, because when I’m bored, I buy stuff...
